title: Baby Carrier
description: two geometric embroidered panels in upper corners in shades of pink; two embroidered floral designs in lower corners in pink, grey and tan; long center panel inserted hand sewn in larger blue geometric design with red binding; back of center panel lined with red, white and tan pattern on blue
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
